item.title: Build and Deploy Kubernetes Kustomize
item.description: Goal kustomize seems to help the setup of multiple clusters by removing copy paste accross cluster and still keeping the configuration file has plain yaml instead of the template like it is often the case with t Key Aspects Compile and deploy the Kustomize code in Kustomize Deploy WIP Conclusion WIP Reference Links Kustomize Description Official Kustomize Code
